backend/main.mo: Defines categories, writings, and user profiles with authorization‑protected CRUD operations and profile access.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of all major frontend files for reference and build planning.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind styles with warm color tokens, dark mode variables, and base layout rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React application root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for public and admin pages with layouts and admin guards.
frontend/src/components/admin/WritingPre: Admin preview component rendering writing title, metadata, and styled content.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays access‑denied messaging with login and navigation options based on auth state.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Protects admin routes by checking Internet Identity login and admin status before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a sign-in/sign-out button using Internet Identity and clears queries on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting users to enter and save their name during profile setup.
frontend/src/components/layout/AdminLayo: Admin dashboard layout with navigation to categories and writings.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Main site layout with header, footer, navigation, login, and optional admin access.
frontend/src/components/state/ErrorState: Displays an error message with optional retry button.
frontend/src/components/state/LoadingSta: Shows a loading message and skeleton placeholders.
frontend/src/hooks/queryKeys.ts: Defines stable query keys for React Query operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated/anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, login handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating categories, writings, user profile, and admin data.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles with custom warm color palette and typography rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, QueryClient, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCategories: Admin view listing all categories with options to create, edit, delete, and view status.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCategoryEd: Form page for creating or editing a category, handling loading, submission, and validation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard showing counts of categories and writings with quick navigation to management pages.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminWritingEdi: Provides a form-driven page for creating or editing writings, handling loading, validation, preview, and submission via admin queries.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminWritingsPa: Displays a list of all admin writings with actions to publish, unpublish, edit, or delete, including loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryPage.tsx: Displays a category with its filtered published writings, handling loading, errors, and navigation to each writing.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows the homepage with a hero section, public categories, and recent writings, with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/WritingDetailPage.tsx: Renders a single writing with its category and warnings, providing navigation back and full content display.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, typography, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, requirements, architecture notes, issues, and image assets for the writing website.
